table.name: Appt_Type
table.description: Appointment Type. A template for appointments.

column.name: appt_type_id
column.descr: Unique ID for a specific Appt Type

column.name: parent_id
column.descr: The parent appt_type ID

column.name: r_ids
column.descr: Resources to which appointment type applies

column.name: caption
column.descr: The descriptive name of the Appt Type

column.name: duration
column.descr: The duration of the appointment in minutes

column.name: lead_time
column.descr: Lead time in minutes before the appointment

column.name: lag_time
column.descr: Lag time in minutes after the appointment

column.name: back_to_back
column.descr: Back-to-Back appointment of this type allowed

column.name: multiple
column.descr: Multiple simultaneous appointments of this type allowed

column.name: num_sim
column.descr: Limit the number of simultaneous appointments of this type

column.name: am_limit
column.descr: Limit the number of appointments of this type in AM hours

column.name: pm_limit
column.descr: Limit the number of appointments of this type in PM hours

column.name: day_limit
column.descr: Limit the number of appointments of this type for the day

column.name: rr_ids
column.descr: Additional Resource(s) required for this appointment type

column.name: owner_org_id
column.descr: The organization which owns this record

table.name: Sch_Template
table.description: A predefined block of time during which a resource is available or unavailable for scheduling events

column.name: template_id
column.descr: Unique ID for a specific template

column.name: r_ids
column.descr: Resource/Person(s) to which template applies

column.name: status
column.descr: Should this template time block be considered active?

column.name: caption
column.descr: The descriptive name of the template

column.name: effective_begin_date
column.descr: The effective start date this template

column.name: effective_end_date
column.descr: The effective end date for this template

column.name: start_time
column.descr: The start time

column.name: end_time
column.descr: The end time

column.name: available
column.descr: Is this time block Available or Unavailable for scheduling events?

column.name: facility_id
column.descr: The location to which the time block applies, e.g. Office, Clinic, or Hospital

column.name: patient_types
column.descr: Limit this template to particular type of patient(s) -- should be one or more comma-separated items enums in Appt_Attendee_Type table

column.name: appt_types
column.descr: Limit this template to particular appointment types

column.name: days_of_month
column.descr: Days-of-Month specification (cron style)

column.name: months
column.descr: Months specification (cron style)

column.name: days_of_week
column.descr: Weekday specification (cron style)

column.name: preferences
column.descr: Any preferences noted by Physician regarding scheduling during this block of time

column.name: remarks
column.descr: Any other data needed for the template

column.name: owner_org_id
column.descr: The organization which owns this record

column.name: chain_id

column.name: owner_org_id
column.descr: The organization which owns this record

table.description: A scheduled meeting with one or more attendees, which may be linked to another event

column.descr: Unique ID for a specific event

column.descr: The original event ID for which this event is waiting (Waiting List).
